body.p: A new Unreal Tournament 2003 GameCD has been released and is available here as well as at similar locations on our various mirrors -- choose one near you.

This latest CD includes a highly-optimized gaming kernel (really helps gameplay,) preliminary bootsplash support, full autodetection of all hardware (sound/input/network,) countless other enhancements and the latest ut2003-demo build. This GameCD requires a modern NVIDIA graphics card to run ut2003-demo. Enjoy!
